ty. 
✱  People should not throw rubbish in any public area and must stop others from 
doing so too. Keeping roads clean is the responsibility of the Village Council 
or the village governing authority, and the municipality in semi-urban areas. 
These bodies must ensure such cleaning on a daily basis. 
✱  Drains along the roads are for removing surplus water. Rubbish must not be thrown into them and neither 
should children be allowed to defecate in them. The 
drains should be cleaned regularly, especially before the rains. This will allow water to run freely and not collect in the drains. In case of water collection, the concerned 
authority must be contacted.  
✱  Areas where water has collected should be filled with 
mud. Area around wells, water taps and hand pumps 
should be cemented with proper drainage to prevent 
water collection.  
✱  There is usually a community dustbin built in each locality.
